blocks.name: itg2seq
blocks.content: Definitional property of the ` S.2 ` integral: for any function ` F ` there is a countable sequence ` g ` of simple functions less than ` F ` whose integrals converge to the integral of ` F ` . (This theorem is for the most part unnecessary in lieu of ~ itg2i1fseq , but unlike that theorem this one doesn't require ` F ` to be measurable.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itg2seq(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(wf(c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wex(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), cn, cdm(citg1)), wral(s1, cn, wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cofr(cle), c0)), wceq(cfv(citg2, c0), csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(citg1, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cxr, clt)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  mpd(wf(c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wex(s0, w3a(wf(cv(s0), cn, cdm(citg1)), wral(s1, cn, wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cofr(cle), c0)), wceq(cfv(citg2, c0), csup(crn(cmpt(s1, cn, cfv(citg1, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1))))), cxr, clt)))), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cn, cdm(citg1)), wral(s1, cn, wa(wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cofr(cle), c0), wbr(cif(cv(s1), co(cfv(citg2, c0), cmin, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(citg2, c0), cpnf)), clt, cfv(citg1, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))))
  syl(wf(c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wex(s0, wa(wf(cv(s0), cn, cdm(citg1)), wral(s1, cn, wa(wbr(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cofr(cle), c0), wbr(cif(cv(s1), co(cfv(citg2, c0), cmin, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(citg2, c0), cpnf)), clt, cfv(citg1, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))))), wral(s1, cn, wrex(hs0, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0), wbr(cif(cv(s1), co(cfv(citg2, c0), cmin, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(citg2, c0), cpnf)), clt, cfv(citg1, cv(hs0)))))))
  ralrimiva(s1, cn, wf(c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wrex(hs0, cdm(citg1), wa(wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0), wbr(cif(cv(s1), co(cfv(citg2, c0), cmin, co(nat1, cdiv, cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(citg2, c0), cpnf)), clt, cfv(citg1, cv(hs0))))))

blocks.name: itg2uba
blocks.content: Approximate version of ~ itg2ub . If ` F ` approximately dominates ` G ` , then ` S.1 G <_ S.2 F ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itg2uba(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(citg1, c0), cle, cfv(citg2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, c2), nat0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  xrletrd(cfv(citg1, c0), cfv(citg2, c1), cfv(citg1, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(nat0, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))), w0)
  rexrd(cfv(citg1, c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(citg1, c0), cr), wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)))
  itg1cl(c0)
  rexrd(cfv(citg1, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(nat0, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(citg1, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(nat0, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c2)))), cr), wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, cif(nat0, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))), cdm(citg1)))
  itg1cl(cmpt(s0, cr, cif(nat0, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))))
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(citg2, c1), cxr), wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  itg2cl(c1)
  itg1lea(hs0, c0, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(nat0, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))), c2, w0)
  breqtrrd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(cmpt(s0, cr, cif(nat0, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c2))), cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cr, c2))))
  leidd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cr, c2))))
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cr, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cr), wf(c0, cr, cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cr))
  syl(w0, wf(c0, cr, cr), wcel(c0, cdm(citg1)))
  i1ff(c0)
  eldifi(cv(hs0), cr, c2)

blocks.name: itg2lea
blocks.content: Approximate version of ~ itg2le . If ` F <_ G ` for almost all ` x ` , then ` S.2 F <_ S.2 G ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2014.)

thm itg2lea(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(cfv(citg2, c0), cle, cfv(citg2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, c2), nat0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))), wbr(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wbr(cfv(citg2, c0), cle, cfv(citg2, c1)), wral(hs0, cdm(citg1), wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0), wbr(cfv(citg1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(citg2, c1)))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, cdm(citg1), w0, wi(wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0), wbr(cfv(citg1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(citg2, c1))))
  expr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0), wbr(cfv(citg1, cv(hs0)), cle, cfv(citg2, c1)))
  itg2uba(s0, cv(hs0), c1, c2, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0))))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0)), wss(c2, cr))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0)), wceq(cfv(covol, c2), nat0))
  xrletrd(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))))
  rexrd(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))))
  syl2an(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2)), wcel(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cr), wf(cv(hs0), cr, cr), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  ffvelrn(cv(hs0), cr, cr, cv(s0))
  sseldi(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), c0))), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))))

thm itg2lea(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(S.2 ` c0)[‚â§](S.2 ` c1))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c0 : ‚Ñù ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(c1 : ‚Ñù ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(vol* ` c2)= 0)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù \ c2))‚Üí(c0 ` s0)[‚â§](c1 ` s0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, (S.2 ` c0)[‚â§](S.2 ` c1), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1),(hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0 ‚Üí(S.1 ` hs0)[‚â§](S.2 ` c1))))
  ralrimiva(hs0, dom(S.1), w0, (hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0 ‚Üí(S.1 ` hs0)[‚â§](S.2 ` c1)))
  expr(w0, hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1), hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0, (S.1 ` hs0)[‚â§](S.2 ` c1))
  itg2uba(s0, hs0, c1, c2, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0)))
  simprl(w0, hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1), hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0), c2 ‚äÜ ‚Ñù)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0), (vol* ` c2)= 0)
  xrletrd((hs0 ` s0), (c1 ` s0), (c0 ` s0), ((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0))‚àß s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù \ c2)))
  rexrd((hs0 ` s0), ((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0))‚àß s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù \ c2)))
  syl2an((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0)), s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù \ c2), (hs0 ` s0)‚àà ‚Ñù, (hs0 : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù), s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ffvelrn(hs0, cr, cr, s0)
  sseldi((c0 ` s0), cxr, (0[[,]]+‚àû), ((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0))‚àß s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù \ c2)))
  syl2an((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0)), s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù \ c2), (c0 ` s0)‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû), (c0 : ‚Ñù ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)), s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ffvelrn(c0, cr, (0[[,]]+‚àû), s0)
  sseldi((c1 ` s0), cxr, (0[[,]]+‚àû), ((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0))‚àß s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù \ c2)))
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  syl2an((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0)), s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù \ c2), (c1 ` s0)‚àà(0[[,]]+‚àû), (c1 : ‚Ñù ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)), s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0), (c1 : ‚Ñù ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  ffvelrn(c1, cr, (0[[,]]+‚àû), s0)
  sylan2((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0)), s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù \ c2), (hs0 ` s0)[‚â§](c0 ` s0), s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  eldifi(s0, cr, c2)
  r19.21bi(s0, cr, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0)), (hs0 ` s0)[‚â§](c0 ` s0))
  mpbid((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0)), ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù,(hs0 ` s0)[‚â§](c0 ` s0)), hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0)
  simprr(w0, hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1), hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0)
  ofrfval(s0, hs0, cle, c0, cr, (hs0 ` s0), (c0 ` s0), cr, cr, universe, universe, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0)))
  ffnd(hs0, cr, cr, (w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0)))
  ad2antrl(w0, hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1), hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0, (hs0 : ‚Ñù ‚Üí ‚Ñù))

  adantr(w0, (hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0), (c0 : ‚Ñù ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  a1i((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0)), ‚Ñù ‚àà ùïå)
  reex()
  inidm(cr)
  eqidd((hs0 ` s0), ((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0))‚àß s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù))
  eqidd((c0 ` s0), ((w0 ‚àß(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0))‚àß s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù))
  adantlr(w0, (hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0), s0 ‚àà(‚Ñù \ c2), (c0 ` s0)[‚â§](c1 ` s0))
  syl2anc(w0, ((S.2 ` c0)[‚â§](S.2 ` c1)‚Üî ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1),(hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0 ‚Üí(S.1 ` hs0)[‚â§](S.2 ` c1)))), (c0 : ‚Ñù ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)), (S.2 ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  syl(w0, (S.2 ` c1)‚àà ‚Ñù*, (c1 : ‚Ñù ‚Üí(0[[,]]+‚àû)))
  itg2cl(c1)
  itg2leub(hs0, c0, (S.2 ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, w0, (hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1)‚àß hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0))
  diff.wa.s(s0, hs0 ‚àà dom(S.1), hs0[oR(‚â§)]c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, dom(S.1))
  diff.cdm.s(s0, citg1)

blocks.name: itg2eqa
blocks.content: Approximate equality of integrals. If ` F = G ` for almost all ` x ` , then ` S.2 F = S.2 G ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itg2eqa(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(citg2, c0), cfv(citg2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, c2), nat0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  xrletrid(cfv(citg2, c0), cfv(citg2, c1), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(citg2, c0), cxr), wf(c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  itg2cl(c0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cfv(citg2, c1), cxr), wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  itg2cl(c1)
  itg2lea(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  breqtrd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))))
  itg2lea(s0, c1, c0, c2, w0)
  eqbrtrrd(cfv(c1, cv(s0)), cle, cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))))
  xrleidd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))))
  sseldi(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), cxr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2))))
  iccssxr(nat0, cpnf)
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(cr, c2)), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wf(c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  eldifi(cv(s0), cr, c2)
  ffvelrn(c0, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf), cv(s0))
}

  3imtr4d(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1))), wbr(cv(hs0), cofr(cle), co(cxp(cr, csn(c0)), cof(cmul), c1)), wbr(cfv(citg1, cv(hs0)), cle, co(c0, cmul, cfv(citg2, c1))), wbr(co(cxp(cr, csn(co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), cof(cmul), cv(hs0)), cofr(cle), c1), wbr(cfv(citg1, co(cxp(cr, csn(co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), cof(cmul), cv(hs0))), cle, cfv(citg2, c1)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1))), wi(wbr(co(cxp(cr, csn(co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), cof(cmul), cv(hs0)), cofr(cle), c1), wbr(cfv(citg1, co(cxp(cr, csn(co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), cof(cmul), cv(hs0))), cle, cfv(citg2, c1))), wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(co(cxp(cr, csn(co(nat1, cdiv, c0))), cof(cmul), cv(hs0)), cdm(citg1)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1)), wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  sylancl(w0, wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wss(co(nat0, cico, cpnf), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  fss(c1, cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  i1fmulc(co(nat1, cdiv, c0), cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(citg1))))

blocks.name: itg2mulc
blocks.content: The integral of a nonnegative constant times a function is the constant times the integral of the original function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: itg2split
blocks.content: The ` S.2 ` integral splits under an almost disjoint union. (The proof avoids the use of ~ itg2add which requires CC.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2014.)

thm itg2split(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(citg2, c0), co(cfv(citg2, c1), caddc, cfv(citg2, c2))))

  -| wi(w0, wceq(c5, cun(c3, c4)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c5)), wcel(c6, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c6, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c3))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c6, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c4))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c6, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c5))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(citg2, c1), cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(citg2, c2), cr))

} = {

blocks.name: itg2monolem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ itg2mono . We show that for any constant ` t ` less than one, ` t x. S.1 H ` is less than ` S ` , and so ` S.1 H <_ S ` , which is one half of the equality in ~ itg2mono . Consider the sequence ` A ( n ) = { x | t x. H <_ F ( n ) } ` . This is an increasing sequence of measurable sets whose union is ` RR ` , and so ` H |`` A ( n ) ` has an integral which equals ` S.1 H ` in the limit, by ~ itg1climres . Then by taking the limit in ` ( t x. H ) |`` A ( n ) <_ F ( n ) ` , we get ` t x. S.1 H <_ S ` as desired. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Aug-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: itg2mono
blocks.content: The Monotone Convergence Theorem for nonnegative functions. If ` { ( F `` n ) : n e. NN } ` is a monotone increasing sequence of positive, measurable, real-valued functions, and ` G ` is the pointwise limit of the sequence, then ` ( S.2 `` G ) ` is the limit of the sequence ` { ( S.2 `` ( F `` n ) ) : n e. NN } ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: itg2i1fseqle
blocks.content: Subject to the conditions coming from ~ mbfi1fseq , the sequence of simple functions are all less than the target function ` F ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itg2i1fseqle(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, cn)), wbr(cfv(c1, c0), cofr(cle), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cmbf))

blocks.name: itg2i1fseq
blocks.content: Subject to the conditions coming from ~ mbfi1fseq , the integral of the sequence of simple functions converges to the integral of the target function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: itg2i1fseq2
blocks.content: In an extension to the results of ~ itg2i1fseq , if there is an upper bound on the integrals of the simple functions approaching ` F ` , then ` S.2 F ` is real and the standard limit relation applies. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itg2i1fseq2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cfv(citg2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cmbf))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, cn, cdm(citg1)))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, cn, wa(wbr(c0p, cofr(cle), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cofr(cle), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s1, cr, wbr(cmpt(s0, cn, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cli, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, cn, cfv(citg1, cfv(c2, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), cn)), wbr(cfv(citg1, cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cle, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cfv(citg2, c1))), diffss(s1, s3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cfv(citg2, c1))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cfv(citg2, c1))), diffsc(s3, c1))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cfv(citg2, c1))), diffsc(s3, c2))
  breqtrrd(c0, cli, cfv(citg2, c1), csup(crn(c0), cr, clt), w0)
  climsup(s3, hs0, c0, cn, nat1, w0)
  nnuz()
  1zzd(w0)
  3brtr4d(cfv(c0, cv(s3)), cle, cfv(c0, co(cv(s3), caddc, nat1)), cfv(citg1, cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cfv(citg1, cfv(c2, co(cv(s3), caddc, nat1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), cn)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s3), cn)), wbr(cfv(citg1, cfv(c2, cv(s3))), cle, cfv(citg1, cfv(c2, co(cv(s3), caddc, nat1)))), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(s3)), cdm(citg1)), wcel(cfv(c2, co(cv(s3), caddc, nat1)), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s3)), cofr(cle), cfv(c2, co(cv(s3), caddc, nat1))))
  ffvelrnda(cv(s3), cn, c2, cdm(citg1), w0)
  syl2an(w0, wcel(cv(s3), cn), wcel(cfv(c2, co(cv(s3), caddc, nat1)), cdm(citg1)), wf(c2, cn, cdm(citg1)), wcel(co(cv(s3), caddc, nat1), cn))
  ffvelrn(c2, cn, cdm(citg1), co(cv(s3), caddc, nat1))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(s3), cn), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s3)), cofr(cle), cfv(c2, co(cv(s3), caddc, nat1))), wral(s0, cn, wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cofr(cle), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))))
  syl(w0, wral(s0, cn, wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cofr(cle), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))), wral(s0, cn, wa(wbr(c0p, cofr(cle), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cofr(cle), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))))
  ralimi(s0, cn, wa(wbr(c0p, cofr(cle), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cofr(cle), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1)))), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cofr(cle), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))
  simpr(wbr(c0p, cofr(cle), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cofr(cle), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))
  rspccva(s0, cn, cv(s3), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cofr(cle), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s3)), cofr(cle), cfv(c2, co(cv(s3), caddc, nat1))))

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà ‚Ñù,(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶((c2 ` s0)` s1))[~~>](c1 ` s1)))
  ‚ä£ c0 =(s2 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚Ü¶(S.1 `(c2 ` s2)))

blocks.name: itg2i1fseq3
blocks.content: Special case of ~ itg2i1fseq2 : if the integral of ` F ` is a real number, then the standard limit relation holds on the integrals of simple functions approaching ` F ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itg2i1fseq3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cli, cfv(citg2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cmbf))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c2, cn, cdm(citg1)))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s0, cn, wa(wbr(c0p, cofr(cle), cfv(c2, cv(s0))), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cofr(cle), cfv(c2, co(cv(s0), caddc, nat1))))))
  -| wi(w0, wral(s1, cr, wbr(cmpt(s0, cn, cfv(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), cli, cfv(c1, cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, cn, cfv(citg1, cfv(c2, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cfv(citg2, c1), cr))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  itg2i1fseq2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, c0, c1, c2, cfv(citg2, c1), w0)
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn)), wbr(cfv(citg1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0))), cle, cfv(citg2, c1)), wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cdm(citg1)), wbr(cfv(c2, cv(hs0)), cofr(cle), c1))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cn), wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  sylancl(w0, wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wf(c1, cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf)), wss(co(nat0, cico, cpnf), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)))
  icossicc(nat0, cpnf)
  fss(c1, cr, co(nat0, cico, cpnf), co(nat0, cicc, cpnf))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs0), cn, c2, cdm(citg1), w0)
  itg2i1fseqle(s0, s1, cv(hs0), c2, c1, w0)
  itg2ub(c1, cfv(c2, cv(hs0)))
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, citg2, c1)
  diff.citg2.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(citg2, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.content: The ` S.2 ` integral is linear. (Measurability is an essential component of this theorem; otherwise consider the characteristic function of a nonmeasurable set and its complement.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: itg2gt0
blocks.content: If the function ` F ` is strictly positive on a set of positive measure, then the integral of the function is positive. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: itg2cn
blocks.content: A sort of absolute continuity of the Lebesgue integral (this is the core of ~ ftc1a which is about actual absolute continuity). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: ibllem
blocks.content: Conditioned equality theorem for the if statement. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jul-2014.)

blocks.name: isibl
blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is integrable". The "integrable" predicate corresponds roughly to the range of validity of ` S. A B _d x ` , which is to say that the expression ` S. A B _d x ` doesn't make sense unless ` ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jun-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm isibl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cibl), wa(wcel(c0, cmbf), wral(s0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), wcel(cfv(citg2, c1), cr)))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cmpt(s1, cr, cif(c3, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wbr(nat0, cle, c3))))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(c3, cfv(cre, co(c4, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(s0))))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cdm(c0), c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cfv(c0, cv(s1)), c4))

blocks.name: isibl2
blocks.content: The predicate " ` F ` is integrable" when ` F ` is a mapping operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 31-Jul-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Aug-2014.)

thm isibl2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {

blocks.name: itgmpt
blocks.content: Change bound variable in an integral. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgmpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s1, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s1, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1))))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  syl5req(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s1, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1))), citg(s0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0))), w0)
  cbvitg(s1, s0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s1)), cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)))
  fveq2(cv(s1), cv(s0), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  nffvmpt1(s0, c0, c1, cv(s1))
  nfcv(s1, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)))
  itgeq2dv(s0, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), c1, w0)
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0)), c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  fvmpt2(s0, c0, c1, c2, cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(s0))
  diff.cmpt.s(s1, s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

  sylan2(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, nat3)), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cr), wcel(cv(hs0), cz))

thm iblposlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)))))), nat0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)))))), nat0)), diffsc(s0, c0))
  syl6eq(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)))))), nat0, cfv(citg2, cxp(cr, csn(nat0))), w0)
  fveq2d(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1))))), cxp(cr, csn(nat0)), w0)
  syl6eqr(cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1))))), cxp(cr, csn(nat0)), cmpt(s0, cr, nat0), w0)
  mpteq2dv(s0, cr, cif(cneg(c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)))), nat0, w0)
  syl6eq(cif(cneg(c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)))), nat0, cif(nat0, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)))), w0)
  ifeq1da(cneg(c1), nat0, nat0, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1))))
  mpbir2and(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)))), wceq(cneg(c1), nat0), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)))
  adantrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, nat0))
  mpbid(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(cneg(c1), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  le0neg2d(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)))), wb(wceq(cneg(c1), nat0), wa(wbr(cneg(c1), cle, nat0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)))), wcel(cneg(c1), cr), wcel(nat0, cr))
  renegcld(c1, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)))))
  adantrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)), wcel(c1, cr))

thm itgrecl(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(citg(s0, c0, c1), cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrd(citg(s0, c0, c1), cr, co(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c1, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))))), cmin, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1))))))), w0)
  itgrevallem1(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(co(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c1, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))))), cmin, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1))))))), cr), w3a(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c1, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))))), cr), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)))))), cr)))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c1, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))))), cr), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)))))), cr)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  iblrelem(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  3adant1(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c1, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))))), cr), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)))))), cr), wcel(co(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c1, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))))), cmin, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1))))))), cr))
  resubcl(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c1, nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))))), cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(c1)))))))
}

thm itgcnval(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1))))))

} = {
  eqtr4d(citg(s0, c0, c1), co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)))), co(co(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, c1)))))), cmin, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cre, c1)))))))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, co(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cim, c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cim, c1)))))), cmin, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cim, c1)))))))))), w0)
  itgcnlem(s0, c0, c1, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, c1)))))), cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cre, c1))))))), cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cim, c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cim, c1)))))), cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cim, c1))))))), c2, w0)
  eqid(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, c1)))))))
  eqid(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cre, c1))))))))
  eqid(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cim, c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cim, c1)))))))
  eqid(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cim, c1))))))))
  oveq12d(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1))), co(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, c1)))))), cmin, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cre, c1)))))))), co(ci, cmul, co(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cim, c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cim, c1)))))), cmin, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cim, c1))))))))), w0)
  itgrevallem1(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1), w0)
  recld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simpld(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cibl))
  oveq2d(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), co(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cim, c1), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cim, c1)))))), cmin, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cim, c1)))))))), w0)
  itgrevallem1(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1), w0)
  imcld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simprd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cibl))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cibl)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  iblcn(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c1, c2, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  iblmbf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))

  eqid((S.2 `(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚Ü¶ if((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß 0[‚â§](Re ` c1)),(Re ` c1), 0))))

  eqid((S.2 `(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚Ü¶ if((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß 0[‚â§](Im ` c1)),(Im ` c1), 0))))
  eqid((S.2 `(s0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚Ü¶ if((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß 0[‚â§]-u((Im ` c1))), -u((Im ` c1)), 0))))

  syl(w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà MblFn, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà L^1)

blocks.name: iblneg
blocks.content: The negative of an integrable function is integrable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)

  ifbieq1d(cneg(cfv(cre, cneg(c1))), nat0, cfv(cre, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cre, cneg(c1)))), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, c1)))

  eqtrd(cneg(cfv(cre, cneg(c1))), cfv(cre, c1), cneg(cneg(cfv(cre, c1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  negeqd(cfv(cre, cneg(c1)), cneg(cfv(cre, c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  renegd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  negnegd(cfv(cre, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  recnd(cfv(cre, c1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

  breq2d(nat0, cle, cfv(cim, cneg(c1)), cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

  eqeltrd(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cneg(cfv(cim, cneg(c1))), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cim, cneg(c1)))))), cibl, cmpt(s0, c0, cif(cfv(cim, c1), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cim, c1)))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, cif(cneg(cfv(cim, cneg(c1))), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cneg(cfv(cim, cneg(c1))))), cif(cfv(cim, c1), nat0, wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cim, c1))), w0)

  eqtrd(cneg(cfv(cim, cneg(c1))), cfv(cim, c1), cneg(cneg(cfv(cim, c1))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  negeqd(cfv(cim, cneg(c1)), cneg(cfv(cim, c1)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  imnegd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

thm itgneg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cneg(citg(s0, c0, c1)), citg(s0, c0, cneg(c1))))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(cneg(citg(s0, c0, c1)), citg(s0, c0, cneg(c1)), cneg(co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1))))), co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, cneg(c1))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, cneg(c1))))), w0)

  negdid(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1))), w0)

blocks.name: iblss
blocks.content: A subset of an integrable function is integrable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm iblss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cr)))
  eqeltrrd(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf, cres(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c0), w0)

  mbfres(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), c0)
  ralrimiva(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), w0, wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cr))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, nat3))), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cr), wf(cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))), cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cr), wbr(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cle, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))))))

blocks.name: itgitg2
blocks.content: Transfer an integral using ` S.2 ` to an equivalent integral using ` S. ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgitg2(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, cr, c0), cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, c0))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), wbr(nat0, cle, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, cr, c0), cibl))
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl6eq(citg(s0, cr, c0), cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, c0)), cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)))), w0)
  itgposval(s0, cr, c0, w0)
  fveq2i(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), cr))), cmpt(s0, cr, c0))
  mpteq2ia(s0, cr, cif(c0, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), cr)), c0)
  iftrue(c0, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: itgge0
blocks.content: The integral of a positive function is positive. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgge0(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(nat0, cle, citg(s0, c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl5eqbrr(nat0, cle, citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c0, nat0), w0)
  itgz(s0, c0)
  itgle(s0, c0, nat0, c1, w0)
  syl5eqelr(cmpt(s0, c0, nat0), cibl, cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), w0)
  fconstmpt(s0, c0, nat0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cibl), wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)))
  mbfdm2(s0, c0, c1, cr, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  iblmbf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  ibl0(c0)
  0red(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: itgss2
blocks.content: Expand the set of an integral by adding zeroes outside the domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgss2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wss(c0, c1), wceq(citg(s0, c0, c2), citg(s0, c1, cif(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtr3d(citg(s0, c0, c2), citg(s0, c1, cif(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), citg(s0, c0, cif(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), wss(c0, c1))
  itgeq2dv(s0, c0, cif(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c2, wss(c0, c1))
  adantl(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cif(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c2))
  iftrue(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  itgss(s0, c0, cif(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c1, wss(c0, c1))
  id(wss(c0, c1))
  adantl(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, c0)), wceq(cif(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), nat0))
  iffalsed(c2, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c1, c0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  eldifn(cv(s0), c1, c0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm itgss2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚äÜ c1 ‚Üí S.(c0, c2, s0)= S.(c1, if(s0 ‚àà c0, c2, 0), s0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtr3d(S.(c0, c2, s0), S.(c1, if(s0 ‚àà c0, c2, 0), s0), S.(c0, if(s0 ‚àà c0, c2, 0), s0), c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  itgeq2dv(s0, c0, if(s0 ‚àà c0, c2, 0), c2, c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  adantl(c0 ‚äÜ c1, s0 ‚àà c0, if(s0 ‚àà c0, c2, 0)= c2)
  iftrue(c2, nat0, s0 ‚àà c0)
  itgss(s0, c0, if(s0 ‚àà c0, c2, 0), c1, c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  id(c0 ‚äÜ c1)
  adantl(c0 ‚äÜ c1, s0 ‚àà(c1 \ c0), if(s0 ‚àà c0, c2, 0)= 0)
  iffalsed(c2, nat0, s0 ‚àà(c1 \ c0), s0 ‚àà c0)
  eldifn(s0, c1, c0)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: itgeqa
blocks.content: Approximate equality of integrals. If ` C ( x ) = D ( x ) ` for almost all ` x ` , then ` S. B C ( x ) _d x = S. B D ( x ) _d x ` and one is integrable iff the other is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgeqa(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl)), wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c0, c2))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c3, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, c3), nat0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, c3))), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  jca(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl)), wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c0, c2)))
  3bitr4d(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cr))), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmbf), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c2, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cr))))

blocks.name: itgss3
blocks.content: Expand the set of an integral by a nullset. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Aug-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: itgioo
blocks.content: Equality of integrals on open and closed intervals. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2014.)

thm itgioo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), citg(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cicc, c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  simprd(w0, wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), citg(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), c2)), wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), c2), cibl)))
  itgss3(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2, co(c0, cicc, c1), w0)
  a1i(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  ioossicc(c0, c1)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(c0, cicc, c1), cr), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  iccssre(c0, c1)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1))), nat0), wss(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), cpr(c0, c1)), wss(cpr(c0, c1), cr), wceq(cfv(covol, cpr(c0, c1)), nat0))
  ltlecasei(c1, c0, w0, wss(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), cpr(c0, c1)))
  syl6eqss(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), cpr(c0, c1), cdif(emptycls, co(c0, cioo, c1)), wa(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  difeq1d(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1), emptycls, wa(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0)))
  biimpar(w0, wbr(c1, clt, c0), wceq(co(c0, cicc, c1), emptycls))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, cicc, c1), emptycls), wbr(c1, clt, c0)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  icc0(c0, c1)
  eqsstri(cdif(emptycls, co(c0, cioo, c1)), cpr(c0, c1), emptycls)
  0dif(co(c0, cioo, c1))
  0ss(cpr(c0, c1))
  syl6eqss(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), cpr(c0, c1), cdif(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  syl6eq(cdif(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), cdif(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), cdif(cun(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), co(c0, cioo, c1)), wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  difeq1d(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1), cun(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  syl5req(co(c0, cicc, c1), cun(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)))
  uncom(cpr(c0, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wceq(cun(co(c0, cioo, c1), cpr(c0, c1)), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c1))
  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(c0, cxr))
  rexrd(c0, w0)
  adantr(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c1), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexrd(c1, w0)

blocks.name: itgless

thm itgless(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(citg(s0, c0, c1), cle, citg(s0, c2, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqbrtrd(citg(s0, c0, c1), cle, citg(s0, c2, c1), citg(s0, c2, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c2, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))), wss(c0, c2))
  itgss2(s0, c0, c2, c1)
  itgle(s0, c2, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c1, w0)
  iblss2(s0, c2, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c0, cr, w0)
  mbfdm2(s0, c2, c1, cr, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, c1), cibl))
  iblmbf(cmpt(s0, c2, c1))
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(nat0, cr))
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(cv(s0), c2))
  sselda(cv(s0), c0, c2, w0)
  iffalsed(c1, nat0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0))), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  adantl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c2, c0)), wn(wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  eldifn(cv(s0), c2, c0)
  syl5eqel(cmpt(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))), cibl, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), w0)
  mpteq2ia(s0, c0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), c1)
  iftrue(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  iblss(s0, c0, c1, c2, cr, w0)
  sylancl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wcel(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(nat0, cr))
  0re()
  ifcl(c1, cr, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wbr(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, cle, c1))
  leidd(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)))
  ifboth(c1, nat0, wbr(c1, cle, c1), wbr(nat0, cle, c1), wbr(cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), cle, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  breq1(c1, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), cle, c1)
  breq1(nat0, cif(c1, nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), cle, c1)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

thm itgless(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí S.(c0, c1, s0)[‚â§]S.(c2, c1, s0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚äÜ c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà dom(vol))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)‚Üí c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2)‚Üí 0[‚â§]c1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà L^1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqbrtrd(S.(c0, c1, s0), cle, S.(c2, c1, s0), S.(c2, if(s0 ‚àà c0, c1, 0), s0), w0)
  syl(w0, S.(c0, c1, s0)= S.(c2, if(s0 ‚àà c0, c1, 0), s0), c0 ‚äÜ c2)
  itgss2(s0, c0, c2, c1)
  itgle(s0, c2, if(s0 ‚àà c0, c1, 0), c1, w0)
  iblss2(s0, c2, if(s0 ‚àà c0, c1, 0), c0, cr, w0)
  mbfdm2(s0, c2, c1, cr, w0)
  syl(w0, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà MblFn, (s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà L^1)
  iblmbf((s0 ‚àà c2 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  sylancl((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0), if(s0 ‚àà c0, c1, 0)‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, 0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  syldan(w0, s0 ‚àà c0, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, s0 ‚àà c2)
  sselda(s0, c0, c2, w0)
  iffalsed(c1, nat0, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c2 \ c0)), s0 ‚àà c0)
  adantl(w0, s0 ‚àà(c2 \ c0), ¬¨ s0 ‚àà c0)
  eldifn(s0, c2, c0)
  syl5eqel((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ if(s0 ‚àà c0, c1, 0)), cibl, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1), w0)
  mpteq2ia(s0, c0, if(s0 ‚àà c0, c1, 0), c1)
  iftrue(c1, nat0, s0 ‚àà c0)
  iblss(s0, c0, c1, c2, cr, w0)
  sylancl((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2), if(s0 ‚àà c0, c1, 0)‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, 0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  0re()
  ifcl(c1, cr, nat0, s0 ‚àà c0)
  syl2anc((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2), if(s0 ‚àà c0, c1, 0)[‚â§]c1, c1[‚â§]c1, 0[‚â§]c1)
  leidd(c1, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c2))
  ifboth(c1, nat0, c1[‚â§]c1, 0[‚â§]c1, if(s0 ‚àà c0, c1, 0)[‚â§]c1, s0 ‚àà c0)
  breq1(c1, if(s0 ‚àà c0, c1, 0), cle, c1)
  breq1(nat0, if(s0 ‚àà c0, c1, 0), cle, c1)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: iblsub
blocks.content: Subtract two integrals over the same domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm iblsub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cibl))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), cibl, cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2)), co(c1, cmin, c2), w0)
  negsubd(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  ibladd(s0, c0, c1, cneg(c2), cc, w0)
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  iblmbf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  negcld(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl))
  iblmbf(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  iblneg(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

thm iblsub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1[-]c2))‚àà L^1)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà L^1)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà L^1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1[-]c2)), cibl, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(c1[+]-u(c2))), w0)
  mpteq2dva(s0, c0, (c1[+]-u(c2)), (c1[-]c2), w0)
  negsubd(c1, c2, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  ibladd(s0, c0, c1, -u(c2), cc, w0)
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà MblFn, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà L^1)
  iblmbf((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))

  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà MblFn, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà L^1)
  iblmbf((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2))

blocks.name: itgadd
blocks.content: Add two integrals over the same domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm itgadd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, c2)), co(citg(s0, c0, c1), caddc, citg(s0, c0, c2))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(citg(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, c2)), co(citg(s0, c0, c1), caddc, citg(s0, c0, c2)), co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, co(c1, caddc, c2))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, co(c1, caddc, c2))))), co(co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)))), caddc, co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c2)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2))))), w0)
  eqtrd(co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, co(c1, caddc, c2))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, co(c1, caddc, c2))))), co(co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)))), caddc, co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c2)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2))))), co(co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), caddc, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c2))), caddc, co(co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2))))), w0)
  oveq12d(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, co(c1, caddc, c2))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, co(c1, caddc, c2)))), co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), caddc, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c2))), co(co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2)))), w0)
  eqtrd(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, co(c1, caddc, c2))), co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), caddc, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c2))), citg(s0, c0, co(cfv(cre, c1), caddc, cfv(cre, c2))), w0)
  itgeq2dv(s0, c0, cfv(cre, co(c1, caddc, c2)), co(cfv(cre, c1), caddc, cfv(cre, c2)), w0)
  readdd(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  itgaddlem2(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1), cfv(cre, c2), cr, w0)
  eqtrd(co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, co(c1, caddc, c2)))), co(co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1))), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2)))), co(ci, cmul, co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), caddc, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2)))), w0)
  oveq2d(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, co(c1, caddc, c2))), co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), caddc, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2))), w0)
  eqtrd(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, co(c1, caddc, c2))), co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), caddc, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2))), citg(s0, c0, co(cfv(cim, c1), caddc, cfv(cim, c2))), w0)
  itgeq2dv(s0, c0, cfv(cim, co(c1, caddc, c2)), co(cfv(cim, c1), caddc, cfv(cim, c2)), w0)
  imaddd(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

  a1i(w0, wcel(ci, cc))
  add4d(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c2)), co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1))), co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2))), w0)

  recld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))

  sylancr(w0, wcel(co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1))), cc), wcel(ci, cc), wcel(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cc))
  itgcl(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1), cr, w0)
  imcld(c1, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simprd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cibl))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)), cibl)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  iblcn(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  iblmbf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  mulcl(ci, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)))
  sylancr(w0, wcel(co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2))), cc), wcel(ci, cc), wcel(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2)), cc))
  ax-icn()
  itgcl(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2), cr, w0)
  imcld(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  simprd(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2)), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c2)), cibl))
  mpbid(w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c2)), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2)), cibl)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl))
  iblcn(s0, c0, c2, w0)
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl))
  iblmbf(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  mulcl(ci, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2)))
  itgcnval(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, c2), universe, w0)
  ovexd(c1, caddc, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  ibladd(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  oveq12d(citg(s0, c0, c1), caddc, citg(s0, c0, c2), co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c1)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c1)))), co(citg(s0, c0, cfv(cre, c2)), caddc, co(ci, cmul, citg(s0, c0, cfv(cim, c2)))), w0)
  itgcnval(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  itgcnval(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

thm itgadd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí S.(c0,(c1[+]c2), s0)=(S.(c0, c1, s0)[+]S.(c0, c2, s0)))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà L^1)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà L^1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(S.(c0,(c1[+]c2), s0), (S.(c0, c1, s0)[+]S.(c0, c2, s0)), (S.(c0,(Re `(c1[+]c2)), s0)[+](i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im `(c1[+]c2)), s0))), ((S.(c0,(Re ` c1), s0)[+](i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0)))[+](S.(c0,(Re ` c2), s0)[+](i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im ` c2), s0)))), w0)
  eqtrd((S.(c0,(Re `(c1[+]c2)), s0)[+](i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im `(c1[+]c2)), s0))), ((S.(c0,(Re ` c1), s0)[+](i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0)))[+](S.(c0,(Re ` c2), s0)[+](i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im ` c2), s0)))), ((S.(c0,(Re ` c1), s0)[+]S.(c0,(Re ` c2), s0))[+]((i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0))[+](i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im ` c2), s0)))), w0)
  oveq12d(S.(c0,(Re `(c1[+]c2)), s0), caddc, (i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im `(c1[+]c2)), s0)), (S.(c0,(Re ` c1), s0)[+]S.(c0,(Re ` c2), s0)), ((i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0))[+](i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im ` c2), s0))), w0)
  eqtrd(S.(c0,(Re `(c1[+]c2)), s0), (S.(c0,(Re ` c1), s0)[+]S.(c0,(Re ` c2), s0)), S.(c0,((Re ` c1)[+](Re ` c2)), s0), w0)
  itgeq2dv(s0, c0, (Re `(c1[+]c2)), ((Re ` c1)[+](Re ` c2)), w0)
  readdd(c1, c2, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  itgaddlem2(s0, c0, (Re ` c1), (Re ` c2), cr, w0)
  eqtrd((i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im `(c1[+]c2)), s0)), ((i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0))[+](i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im ` c2), s0))), (i[√ó](S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0)[+]S.(c0,(Im ` c2), s0))), w0)
  oveq2d(ci, cmul, S.(c0,(Im `(c1[+]c2)), s0), (S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0)[+]S.(c0,(Im ` c2), s0)), w0)
  eqtrd(S.(c0,(Im `(c1[+]c2)), s0), (S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0)[+]S.(c0,(Im ` c2), s0)), S.(c0,((Im ` c1)[+](Im ` c2)), s0), w0)
  itgeq2dv(s0, c0, (Im `(c1[+]c2)), ((Im ` c1)[+](Im ` c2)), w0)
  imaddd(c1, c2, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  itgaddlem2(s0, c0, (Im ` c1), (Im ` c2), cr, w0)
  adddid(ci, S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0), S.(c0,(Im ` c2), s0), w0)
  a1i(w0, i ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  add4d(S.(c0,(Re ` c1), s0), S.(c0,(Re ` c2), s0), (i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0)), (i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im ` c2), s0)), w0)
  itgcl(s0, c0, (Re ` c1), cr, w0)
  recld(c1, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  simpld(w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(Re ` c1))‚àà L^1, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(Im ` c1))‚àà L^1)
  itgcl(s0, c0, (Re ` c2), cr, w0)
  recld(c2, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  simpld(w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(Re ` c2))‚àà L^1, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(Im ` c2))‚àà L^1)
  sylancr(w0, (i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0))‚àà ‚ÑÇ, i ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0)‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  itgcl(s0, c0, (Im ` c1), cr, w0)
  imcld(c1, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  simprd(w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(Im ` c1))‚àà L^1, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(Re ` c1))‚àà L^1)
  mpbid(w0, ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(Re ` c1))‚àà L^1 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(Im ` c1))‚àà L^1), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà L^1)
  iblcn(s0, c0, c1, w0)
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà MblFn, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà L^1)
  iblmbf((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  mulcl(ci, S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0))
  sylancr(w0, (i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im ` c2), s0))‚àà ‚ÑÇ, i ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, S.(c0,(Im ` c2), s0)‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  ax-icn()
  itgcl(s0, c0, (Im ` c2), cr, w0)
  imcld(c2, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  simprd(w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(Im ` c2))‚àà L^1, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(Re ` c2))‚àà L^1)
  mpbid(w0, ((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(Re ` c2))‚àà L^1 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶(Im ` c2))‚àà L^1), (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà L^1)
  iblcn(s0, c0, c2, w0)
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà MblFn, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà L^1)
  iblmbf((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2))
  mulcl(ci, S.(c0,(Im ` c2), s0))
  itgcnval(s0, c0, (c1[+]c2), universe, w0)
  ovexd(c1, caddc, c2, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  ibladd(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  oveq12d(S.(c0, c1, s0), caddc, S.(c0, c2, s0), (S.(c0,(Re ` c1), s0)[+](i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im ` c1), s0))), (S.(c0,(Re ` c2), s0)[+](i[√ó]S.(c0,(Im ` c2), s0))), w0)
  itgcnval(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  itgcnval(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.content: Subtract two integrals over the same domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)

thm itgsub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(citg(s0, c0, c1), cmin, citg(s0, c0, c2))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(citg(s0, c0, co(c1, cmin, c2)), co(citg(s0, c0, c1), cmin, citg(s0, c0, c2)), citg(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2))), co(citg(s0, c0, c1), caddc, cneg(citg(s0, c0, c2))), w0)
  eqtr4d(citg(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2))), co(citg(s0, c0, c1), caddc, cneg(citg(s0, c0, c2))), co(citg(s0, c0, c1), caddc, citg(s0, c0, cneg(c2))), w0)
  itgadd(s0, c0, c1, cneg(c2), cc, w0)
  negcld(c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  iblneg(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  oveq2d(citg(s0, c0, c1), caddc, cneg(citg(s0, c0, c2)), citg(s0, c0, cneg(c2)), w0)
  itgneg(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  itgeq2dv(s0, c0, co(c1, caddc, cneg(c2)), co(c1, cmin, c2), w0)
  negsubd(c1, c2, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  iblmbf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cmbf), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl))
  iblmbf(cmpt(s0, c0, c2))
  negsubd(citg(s0, c0, c1), citg(s0, c0, c2), w0)
  itgcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  itgcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

thm itgsub(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí S.(c0,(c1[-]c2), s0)=(S.(c0, c1, s0)[-]S.(c0, c2, s0)))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c1 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà L^1)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0)‚Üí c2 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà L^1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr3d(S.(c0,(c1[-]c2), s0), (S.(c0, c1, s0)[-]S.(c0, c2, s0)), S.(c0,(c1[+]-u(c2)), s0), (S.(c0, c1, s0)[+]-u(S.(c0, c2, s0))), w0)
  eqtr4d(S.(c0,(c1[+]-u(c2)), s0), (S.(c0, c1, s0)[+]-u(S.(c0, c2, s0))), (S.(c0, c1, s0)[+]S.(c0, -u(c2), s0)), w0)
  itgadd(s0, c0, c1, -u(c2), cc, w0)
  negcld(c2, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  iblneg(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  oveq2d(S.(c0, c1, s0), caddc, -u(S.(c0, c2, s0)), S.(c0, -u(c2), s0), w0)
  itgneg(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  itgeq2dv(s0, c0, (c1[+]-u(c2)), (c1[-]c2), w0)
  negsubd(c1, c2, (w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c0))
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà MblFn, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1)‚àà L^1)
  iblmbf((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c1))
  mbfmptcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  syl(w0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà MblFn, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà L^1)
  iblmbf((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Ü¶ c2))
  negsubd(S.(c0, c1, s0), S.(c0, c2, s0), w0)
  itgcl(s0, c0, c1, c3, w0)
  itgcl(s0, c0, c2, c3, w0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

thm itgfsum(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s1, c1, citg(s0, c0, c2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cdm(cvol)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c2), cibl))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpi(w0, wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s1, c1, citg(s0, c0, c2)))), wss(c1, c1))
  ssid(c1)
  mpcom(w0, wi(wss(c1, c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s1, c1, citg(s0, c0, c2))))), wcel(c1, cfn))
  findcard2s(hs0, hs1, hs2, c1, wi(w0, wi(wss(c1, c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, c1, c2)), csu(s1, c1, citg(s0, c0, c2)))))), wi(w0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2)))))), wi(w0, wi(wss(emptycls, c1), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cibl))), wi(w0, wi(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs1), citg(s0, c0, c2)))))), wi(w0, wi(wss(cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), c2)), csu(s1, cun(cv(hs1), csn(cv(hs2))), citg(s0, c0, c2)))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), w0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2))))), wi(wss(emptycls, c1), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cibl)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2)))), wss(emptycls, c1), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cibl))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), emptycls, c1)
  mpbiran2d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2)))), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2))))
  3eqtr4a(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2)), citg(s0, c0, nat0), nat0, wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  itgz(s0, c0)
  itgeq2dv(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2), nat0, wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  adantr(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2), nat0))
  syl6eq(csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2)), nat0, csu(s1, emptycls, citg(s0, c0, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  sumeq1(s1, cv(hs0), emptycls, citg(s0, c0, c2))
  sum0(s1, citg(s0, c0, c2))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2))), wcel(cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cibl))
  eleq1d(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl, cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  syl6eqr(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cxp(c0, csn(nat0)), cmpt(s0, c0, nat0), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  mpteq2dv(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2), nat0, wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  syl6eq(csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2), nat0, csu(s1, emptycls, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  sumeq1(s1, cv(hs0), emptycls, c2)
  sum0(s1, c2)
  fconstmpt(s0, c0, nat0)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), w0, wi(wss(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2))))), wi(wss(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs1), citg(s0, c0, c2))))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs0), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs0), citg(s0, c0, c2)))), wss(cv(hs1), c1), wa(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), cibl), wceq(citg(s0, c0, csu(s1, cv(hs1), c2)), csu(s1, cv(hs1), citg(s0, c0, c2)))))
  sseq1(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), c1)

blocks.name: iblabs
blocks.content: The absolute value of an integrable function is integrable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: iblabsr
blocks.content: A measurable function is integrable iff its absolute value is integrable. (See ~ iblabs for the forward implication.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm iblabsr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, cfv(cabs, c1)), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpbir2and(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cibl), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cmbf), wral(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cr)))
  ralrimiva(hs0, co(nat0, cfz, nat3), w0, wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cr))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), co(nat0, cfz, nat3))), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cr), wf(cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))))))), cr, co(nat0, cicc, cpnf)), wcel(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cabs, c1), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))), cr), wbr(cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0)))), nat0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wbr(nat0, cle, cfv(cre, co(c1, cdiv, co(ci, cexp, cv(hs0))))))))), cle, cfv(citg2, cmpt(s0, cr, cif(cfv(cabs, c1), nat0, wcel(cv(s0), c0))))))

thm itgspliticc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cicc, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cicc, c1), c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cicc, c1))), wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cicc, c3), c2), cibl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c3, cicc, c1), c2), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  itgsplit(s0, co(c0, cicc, c1), c2, co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c3, cicc, c1), c4, w0)
  eqtrd(cfv(covol, cin(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c3, cicc, c1))), nat0, cfv(covol, csn(c3)), w0)
  fveq2d(covol, cin(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c3, cicc, c1)), csn(c3), w0)
  3eqtrd(cin(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c3, cicc, c1)), csn(c3), co(cif(c3, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c3)), cicc, cif(c3, c1, wbr(c3, cle, c1))), co(c3, cicc, c3), w0)
  syl22anc(w0, wceq(cin(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c3, cicc, c1)), co(cif(c3, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c3)), cicc, cif(c3, c1, wbr(c3, cle, c1)))), wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  rexrd(c0, w0)
  rexrd(c1, w0)
  ixxin(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c3, c3, c1, cicc, cle, cle)
  df-icc(s0, hs0, hs1)
  xrmaxle(c0, c3, cv(hs1))
  xrlemin(cv(hs1), c3, c1)
  oveq12d(cif(c3, c0, wbr(c0, cle, c3)), cicc, cif(c3, c1, wbr(c3, cle, c1)), c3, c3, w0)
  iftrued(c3, c0, w0, wbr(c0, cle, c3))
  simp2d(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c3), wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c3, cle, c1))
  iftrued(c3, c1, w0, wbr(c3, cle, c1))
  simp3d(w0, wbr(c3, cle, c1), wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c3))
  syl(w0, wceq(co(c3, cicc, c3), csn(c3)), wcel(c3, cxr))
  rexrd(c3, w0)
  iccid(c3)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(covol, csn(c3)), nat0), wcel(c3, cr))
  simp1d(w0, wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1))
  mpbid(w0, w3a(wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wcel(c3, co(c0, cicc, c1)), w3a(wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c3), wbr(c3, cle, c1))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  elicc2(c0, c1, c3)
  ovolsn(c3)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, cicc, c1), cun(co(c0, cicc, c3), co(c3, cicc, c1))), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c3, co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  iccsplit(c0, c1, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cicc, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cicc, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cicc, c1)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cle)
}

thm itgspliticc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí S.((c0[[,]]c1), c2, s0)=(S.((c0[[,]]c3), c2, s0)[+]S.((c3[[,]]c1), c2, s0)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 ‚àà(c0[[,]]c1))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0[[,]]c1))‚Üí c2 ‚àà c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà(c0[[,]]c3)‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà L^1)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí(s0 ‚àà(c3[[,]]c1)‚Ü¶ c2)‚àà L^1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  itgsplit(s0, (c0[[,]]c1), c2, (c0[[,]]c3), (c3[[,]]c1), c4, w0)
  eqtrd((vol* `((c0[[,]]c3)‚ãÇ(c3[[,]]c1))), nat0, (vol* ` { c3 }), w0)
  fveq2d(covol, ((c0[[,]]c3)‚ãÇ(c3[[,]]c1)), { c3 }, w0)
  3eqtrd(((c0[[,]]c3)‚ãÇ(c3[[,]]c1)), { c3 }, (if(c0[‚â§]c3, c3, c0)[[,]]if(c3[‚â§]c1, c3, c1)), (c3[[,]]c3), w0)
  syl22anc(w0, ((c0[[,]]c3)‚ãÇ(c3[[,]]c1))=(if(c0[‚â§]c3, c3, c0)[[,]]if(c3[‚â§]c1, c3, c1)), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  rexrd(c0, w0)
  rexrd(c1, w0)
  ixxin(s0, hs0, hs1, c0, c3, c3, c1, cicc, cle, cle)
  df-icc(s0, hs0, hs1)
  xrmaxle(c0, c3, hs1)
  xrlemin(hs1, c3, c1)
  oveq12d(if(c0[‚â§]c3, c3, c0), cicc, if(c3[‚â§]c1, c3, c1), c3, c3, w0)
  iftrued(c3, c0, w0, c0[‚â§]c3)
  simp2d(w0, c0[‚â§]c3, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c3[‚â§]c1)
  iftrued(c3, c1, w0, c3[‚â§]c1)
  simp3d(w0, c3[‚â§]c1, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c0[‚â§]c3)
  syl(w0, (c3[[,]]c3)= { c3 }, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù*)
  rexrd(c3, w0)
  iccid(c3)
  syl(w0, (vol* ` { c3 })= 0, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  simp1d(w0, c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c0[‚â§]c3, c3[‚â§]c1)
  mpbid(w0, (c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c0[‚â§]c3 ‚àß c3[‚â§]c1), c3 ‚àà(c0[[,]]c1))
  syl2anc(w0, (c3 ‚àà(c0[[,]]c1)‚Üî(c3 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c0[‚â§]c3 ‚àß c3[‚â§]c1)), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  elicc2(c0, c1, c3)
  ovolsn(c3)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0[[,]]c1)=((c0[[,]]c3)‚ãÉ(c3[[,]]c1)), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c3 ‚àà(c0[[,]]c1))
  iccsplit(c0, c1, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cicc, c1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, cicc, c3)
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, cicc, c1)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.cle.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cle)
}

blocks.name: itgsplitioo
blocks.content: The ` S. ` integral splits on open intervals with matching endpoints. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Sep-2014.)

thm itgsplitioo(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cioo, c1))), wcel(c2, cc))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), cibl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2), cibl))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  ecased(w0, wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2))), wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))
  syld(w0, wn(wbr(c0, clt, c3)), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2))), wceq(c0, c3))
  ord(w0, wbr(c0, clt, c3), wceq(c0, c3))
  mpbid(w0, wo(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wceq(c0, c3)), wbr(c0, cle, c3))
  leloed(c0, c3, w0)
  syl5ibrcom(w0, wceq(c0, c3), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2))), wceq(citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2), co(nat0, caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2))))
  eqcomd(citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2), co(nat0, caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)), w0)
  addid2d(citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2), w0)
  itgcl(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2, cc, w0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c3, cioo, c1)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cioo, c1)))
  sselda(cv(s0), co(c3, cioo, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(c3, cioo, c1), co(c0, cioo, c1)), wcel(c0, cxr), wbr(c0, cle, c3))
  simp2d(w0, wbr(c0, cle, c3), wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c3, cle, c1))
  iooss1(c0, c3, c1)
  eqeq12d(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)), citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2), co(nat0, caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)), wceq(c0, c3))
  syl(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c3, cioo, c1)))
  oveq1(c0, c3, cioo, c1)
  itgeq1(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)
  oveq1d(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2), nat0, wceq(c0, c3))
  syl6eq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), nat0, citg(s0, emptycls, c2), wceq(c0, c3))
  syl(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), citg(s0, emptycls, c2)), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c3), emptycls))
  syl6eq(co(c0, cioo, c3), emptycls, co(c3, cioo, c3), wceq(c0, c3))
  oveq1(c0, c3, cioo, c3)
  itgeq1(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), emptycls, c2)
  syld(w0, wn(wbr(c3, clt, c1)), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2))), wceq(c3, c1))
  ord(w0, wbr(c3, clt, c1), wceq(c3, c1))
  mpbid(w0, wo(wbr(c3, clt, c1), wceq(c3, c1)), wbr(c3, cle, c1))
  leloed(c3, c1, w0)
  syl5ibcom(w0, wceq(c3, c1), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2))), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, nat0)))
  eqcomd(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, nat0), w0)
  addid1d(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), w0)
  itgcl(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2, cc, w0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cioo, c3)), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, cioo, c1)))
  sselda(cv(s0), co(c0, cioo, c3), co(c0, cioo, c1), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(co(c0, cioo, c3), co(c0, cioo, c1)), wcel(c1, cxr), wbr(c3, cle, c1))
  simp3d(w0, wbr(c3, cle, c1), wcel(c3, cr), wbr(c0, cle, c3))
  iooss2(c1, c3, c0)
  eqeq12d(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, nat0), citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)), wceq(c3, c1))
  syl(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2)), wceq(co(c0, cioo, c3), co(c0, cioo, c1)))
  oveq2(c3, c1, c0, cioo)
  itgeq1(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), co(c0, cioo, c1), c2)
  oveq2d(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, nat0, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2), wceq(c3, c1))
  syl5eqr(nat0, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2), citg(s0, emptycls, c2), wceq(c3, c1))
  itg0(s0, c2)
  syl(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(citg(s0, emptycls, c2), citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)), wceq(emptycls, co(c3, cioo, c1)))
  syl5eqr(emptycls, co(c3, cioo, c1), co(c3, cioo, c3), wceq(c3, c1))
  iooid(c3)
  oveq2(c3, c1, c3, cioo)
  itgeq1(s0, emptycls, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)
  ex(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1)), wceq(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2))))
  eqtr4d(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2), co(citg(s0, co(c0, cioo, c3), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)), co(citg(s0, cun(co(c0, cioo, c3), csn(c3)), c2), caddc, citg(s0, co(c3, cioo, c1), c2)), wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))))
  itgsplit(s0, co(c0, cioo, c1), c2, cun(co(c0, cioo, c3), csn(c3)), co(c3, cioo, c1), cc, wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))))
  syl6eq(cfv(covol, cin(cun(co(c0, cioo, c3), csn(c3)), co(c3, cioo, c1))), nat0, cfv(covol, emptycls), wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))))
  fveq2d(covol, cin(cun(co(c0, cioo, c3), csn(c3)), co(c3, cioo, c1)), emptycls, wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))))
  syl5eq(cin(cun(co(c0, cioo, c3), csn(c3)), co(c3, cioo, c1)), emptycls, cun(cin(co(c0, cioo, c3), co(c3, cioo, c1)), cin(csn(c3), co(c3, cioo, c1))), wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))))
  indir(co(c0, cioo, c3), csn(c3), co(c3, cioo, c1))
  syl6eq(cun(cin(co(c0, cioo, c3), co(c3, cioo, c1)), cin(csn(c3), co(c3, cioo, c1))), emptycls, cun(emptycls, emptycls), wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))))
  uneq12d(cin(co(c0, cioo, c3), co(c3, cioo, c1)), cin(csn(c3), co(c3, cioo, c1)), emptycls, emptycls, wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))))
  syl21anc(wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))), wceq(cin(co(c0, cioo, c3), co(c3, cioo, c1)), emptycls), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr)), wa(wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)), wbr(c3, cle, c3))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr)))
  jca(w0, wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c3, cxr))
  adantr(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1)), wa(wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr)))
  jca(w0, wcel(c3, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr))
  leidd(c3, wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))))
  ioodisj(c0, c3, c3, c1)
  syl5eq(cin(csn(c3), co(c3, cioo, c1)), emptycls, cin(co(c3, cioo, c1), csn(c3)), wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))))
  incom(csn(c3), co(c3, cioo, c1))
  sylibr(wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))), wceq(cin(co(c3, cioo, c1), csn(c3)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c3, co(c3, cioo, c1))))
  nsyl(wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))), wcel(c3, co(c3, cioo, c1)), wbr(c3, clt, c3))
  ltnrd(c3, wa(w0, wa(wbr(c0, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))))
  simpld(wcel(c3, co(c3, cioo, c1)), wbr(c3, clt, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c1))
  eliooord(c3, c3, c1)

blocks.name: bddmulibl
blocks.content: A bounded function times an integrable function is integrable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: bddibl
blocks.content: A bounded function is integrable. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm bddibl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, cibl))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqeltrrd(c0, cibl, co(c0, cof(cmul), cxp(cdm(c0), csn(nat1))), w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))))
  offveq(hs0, c0, cmul, cxp(cdm(c0), csn(nat1)), c0, cdm(c0), cdm(cvol), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), nat1, w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))))
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))), wfn(cxp(cdm(c0), csn(nat1)), cdm(c0)), wcel(nat1, cc))
  fnconstg(nat1, cc, cdm(c0))
  ffnd(c0, cdm(c0), cc, w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))))
  eqidd(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0))))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, cmbf), wcel(cfv(cvol, cdm(c0)), cr), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, cdm(c0), wbr(cfv(cabs, cfv(c0, cv(s1))), cle, cv(s0))))), wcel(cv(hs0), cdm(c0)), wceq(cfv(cxp(cdm(c0), csn(nat1)), cv(hs0)), nat1))
